  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3607</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3607</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Galí: Aprofundiment: Relacions familiars</string>
            <string language="en">Galí: Consolidation. Familiy relationships</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galí: Verdichtung. Familiy 
Verhältnisse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galí : Fusion. Rapports de Familiy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galí: Consolidação. 
Relacionamentos de Familiy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galí: Consolidamento. Rapporti di 
Familiy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galν: Σταθεροποίηση. Σχέσεις Familiy</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Activitats interactives adreçades a l'alumnat nouvingut. Inclouen la presentació i la pràctica dels noms de les relacions familiars des del punt de vista formal. Les activitats promouen la comprensió i l'expressió oral i escrita.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive activities aimed at pupils who have recently moved to Catalonia. Presentation and practice of the formal vocabulary for family relationships. The activities promote oral and written comprehension and expression.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua parlada</string>
            <string language="en">spoken language</string>
            <string language="es">hablado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Aktivitäten strebten Schüler an, 
die vor kurzem nach Katalonien umgezogen sind. Darstellung und 
Praxis des formalen Wortschatzes für Familie Verhältnisse. Die
Aktivitäten fördern Mund- und schriftliches Erfassen und Ausdruck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les activités interactives ont visé les 
élèves qui se sont récemment déplacés en Catalogne. 
Présentation et pratique du vocabulaire formel pour des 
rapports de famille. Les activités favorisent la compréhension
et l'expression orales et écrites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As atividades interativas visaram os alunos que 
se têm movido recentemente para Catalonia. Apresentação e 
prática do vocabulário formal para relacionamentos da família. 
As atividades promovem a compreensão e a expressão orais e 
escritas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le attività interattive hanno puntato sugli 
allievi che recentemente si sono mossi in Catalogna. 
Presentazione e pratica del vocabolario convenzionale per i 
rapporti della famiglia. Le attività promuovono la comprensione
e l'espressione orali e scritte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικές δραστηριότητες που στοχεύουν στους μαθητές 
που έχουν κινηθεί πρόσφατα προς την Καταλωνία. Παρουσίαση 
και πρακτική του επίσημου λεξιλογίου για τις οικογενειακές 
σχέσεις. Οι δραστηριότητες προωθούν την προφορικές και 
γραπτές κατανόηση και την έκφραση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gesprochene Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage parlé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua falada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio parlato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
